bioAsHtml: For the last couple of years I have been using some tools like GCP, AWS, Kubernetes, Gitlab, Terraform or Ansible to deploy DevOps pipeline and setup/manage highly scalable resilient environments. I am always happy to share my knowledge.

acceptedTalks.title: Comment gérer des applications nécessitant la persistance des données avec Kubernetes

bio:
For the last couple of years I have been using some tools like GCP, AWS, Kubernetes, Gitlab, Terraform or Ansible to deploy DevOps pipeline and setup/manage highly scalable resilient environments.
I am always happy to share my knowledge.
